mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO mc_o11y_trigger_target_storage ( TARGET_SEQ, URL, `DATABASE`, RETENTION_POLICY ) VALUES ( #{targetSeq}, #{url}, #{database}, #{retentionPolicy} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as `count` , URL AS url , `DATABASE` AS `database` , RETENTION_POLICY AS retentionPolicy FROM mc_o11y_trigger_target_storage TTS LEFT JOIN mc_o11y_trigger_target TT ON TT.SEQ = TTS.TARGET_SEQ WHERE POLICY_SEQ = #{policySeq} GROUP BY URL, `DATABASE`, RETENTION_POLICY
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mc_o11y_trigger_target_storage WHERE SEQ IN ( SELECT TTS.SEQ FROM mc_o11y_trigger_target_storage TTS LEFT JOIN mc_o11y_trigger_target TT ON TT.SEQ = TTS.TARGET_SEQ WHERE TT.POLICY_SEQ = #{policySeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT TT.POLICY_SEQ FROM mc_o11y_trigger_target_storage TTS LEFT JOIN mc_o11y_trigger_target TT ON TT.SEQ = TTS.TARGET_SEQ WHERE TTS.URL = #{url} GROUP BY TT.POLICY_SEQ
